WelcomeDescription: Discover amazing content, connect with creators, and share your own stories with our vibrant community.
LatestContentDesc: Stay updated with the latest posts from our community.
ConnectWithOthersDesc: Engage with creators and fellow users through comments, likes, and shares.
JoinDiscussionsDesc: Participate in discussions and share your thoughts on various topics.
FailedFetchPost: Could not load posts, kindly try again later
PasswordsMustMatch: Passwords don’t match. Please make sure both passwords are the same.
Enteryournewpasswordtwicebelowtoresetane: Enter your new password twice below to reset a new password
EnterEmailAssociated: Enter the email address associated with your account, and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
OtpDetails: We’ve sent a verification link to your email address. Please click the link or enter OTP code to confirm your email.
PasswordCriteria: Password must be at least 7 characters long and include at least one lowercase letter, uppercase letter, number, and special character.
